name: dry food for dogs
title: Matzinger Mini Menu · dry food for dogs · beef
description: Matzinger dry food for dogs beef

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Cereals, Meat and animal derivatives (15% of which 4% beef), Vegetable protein extracts, Oils and fats, Glycerol, Propylene glycol, minerals.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 78); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.9); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 5.9); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn:110); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.19).antioxidants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 19000; Vit D3: 1100; Vit E: 90; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 78); 3b202: (I: 1.9); 3b405: (Cu: 8.7); 3b503: (Mn: 5.9); 3b605: (Zn:110); 3b801: (Se: 0.19).antioxidants.

usageInformation.usage: Clean, fresh water should be available at all times. this product is not a toy Keep your children and pets away from this bag to avoid any risk of suffocation.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Matzinger Mini Menü is a balanced complete food for dogs of small breeds. The specially developed smaller croquettes are made with high quality ingredients and fibers to promote healthy digestion.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: Size of dog (Kg) Maintenance (g /day) More Active (g / day) 1 – 5 40 – 120 45 – 140 5 – 10 120 – 190 140 – 220 These amounts are averages based on moderately active dogs at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your dog at a lean, healthy body weight. Fresh clean drinking water should be always available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for small adult dogs up to 10kg
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Dies sind Durchschnittswerte,  basierend auf den Bedürfnissen von kleinrassigen,  ausgewachsenen Hunden mit unterschiedlichen Aktivitätsniveaus bei normalen Umgebungstemperaturen. Die individuellen Bedürfnisse können variieren und die Futtermenge sollte entsprechend angepasst werden. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte stets zur Verfügung stehen.
